movie_title: The loneliest man in history - 6 Minute English
introduction: Improve your English vocabulary and listening in just six minutes! Can you imagine being left in a c

vocabulary.definition: superlative form of lonely, feeling the most isolated or alone
vocabulary.example: Michael Collins was described as the loneliest man in history while circling the Moon.

vocabulary.definition: mutual trust and friendship among people who spend time together
vocabulary.example: The camaraderie between the astronauts grew stronger after their mission to the Moon.

vocabulary.definition: people who are the first to do something and so they lead the way for others
vocabulary.example: Neil Armstrong, Buzz Aldrin, and Michael Collins were true trailblazers in space exploration.

vocabulary.definition: the state of being alone or isolated
vocabulary.example: Collins reflected on the solitude he experienced while orbiting the Moon.

vocabulary.definition: a person who is among the first to explore or settle a new country or area
vocabulary.example: As the first person to orbit the Moon alone, Michael Collins was a true pioneer.

vocabulary.definition: a person or animal with whom one spends a lot of time or travels
vocabulary.example: Even though he was alone in the command module, Collins found solace in his companion, the spacecraft.
